ChangeNote: Fix missing DWH Dimension Hierarchies during partial Import/Export
There have been seen a case where an APL buffer function was called with wrong arguments, and now it will give more information about what went wrong.

When deleting a previously modified transaction where in the 'Functions/period closure settings' sub window, 'unlimited' in period closure privileges column was selected and 'manually input period closure date' was checked and 
 'Actual period closure date' was changed it could happen that the according 'Period closure' holding was not updated correctly<. This has been fixed.
Flaky test has been changed so we next time get wiser - if it should fail again

The recalculation of current values and settlement amounts should not be triggered for irrelevant field changes in the truGen or truCostPstChg environment for transactions native to the window Exercise Options.
Re-implemented validation in Loan Facilities to restrict changes in events transactions for which have been created already
A Once job could store results more than one time.  This happened if data was changed during the processing.  This has been fixed
Client specific change: Changed error, when reversing a payment with PCL records using the STP/Batch Job, into a warning.

In some special cases when using the 'Pricing Method' 'From Key ratio calculation' and in case a 'Key Ratio Mapping' having 'Exclude from' son the 'Key Ratio Mapping' set to 'Portfolio Calculation' this setting was wrongly ignored. This has been fixed.
The tests have become unignored again as their failure were due to a network exception
Fixed an issue in the portfolio calculation, where a missing holding of a loan facility, would abort the whole of the calculation.
Fix captions in the 'Central Trade Manager' window

#### What are the problems/motivations for the changes?

Several SimCorp Dimension installations can run the Alternatives Cloud Backend Service with identical configuration. As a consequence, there is no telling which installation the answering service is running in.

#### What is the proposed solution?

As a start, installation information is added to the service bus response meta data.
Sensitive NetRootDirectory and oauth parameters have been removed from telemetry log.
Flaky test ignored
If the CBU find a problem with the Oracle version, it will now write the supported versions, in the log.
The product usage have been enhanced with information about usage of web client or not.
we have added balance off balance PC for what if scenario
After message refreshing fields for Cash and security movements are still disabled
Prevent fake deletion of global drafts from rule set
Fixes to Web-UC pipeline
Fix possible database error in Security free code update rules by validating length of string
Fixed an error that prevented a user from manually deleting compliance list limits when the option "Keep limits when a list element is removed".
Clean UploadFileEndpointTest and do not run doDelete if fileName is null or empty
Improve type safety in psIns* functions
3T: Implement 'Auto' sizing mode for forms without tabs
Fixed OTC web API tests. Changes do not affect any customer installations.
Transactions Reqnroll tests were enabled
Adding information to inst.log during upgrade about which tables took longest time
Correction of crash occurring in the code that caches group code values.
Flaky test ignored
Properly reference required libs
Remove FAP validation, client specific
ABS accounting values (book values / unrealised P/L) were wrong when simulating in the Asset Manager.  This has now been corrected.
Fix for NET 8 sample service configuration combobox
Fix Delete operation in PositionUniverse transporter
Reference right Oracle library for Net472
Fixed cases when redundunt info about bm or pf files is appeared in control file, when bm segment is empty or pos calc is not calculated
Business Entities authorisation has been implemented.
Instead of hard coded list with selectable free code tables, the free code tables are now added automatically using data dictionary information.
3T: Respect order of formatted string values for axes in charts
Changes to the CCDSWAPS table were not always broadcasted to the rest of the SCD One. The error has been fixed.
In some cases Oracle chose a none optimal execution plan when loading component ids, leading to extreme long response times. The risk for this has been minimized.

TMP/FIN deviation is corrected if the SO Accrued interest transaction is being booked on Fin. Calc booking track and when it was prior backdated by sell on position status. The problem occurs when AI per tax lot functionality is activated on the FAM. This problem prevented saving further TLCA transactions.
Disable TM authorization framework for API instruments and adjusted CalcAdjustedCDSINdexAllocations
Fixed crash on open "Edit table" for "Model portfolio benchmark" field in Portfolio Manager Application.
Prevent crash when delta vectors are not available
Creating new  SimCorp.IMS.Trading.OTC.InstrumentTest.BondSwap2.Test project and moving BondSwapTest2  folder with all feature files to new project
ORA-01017 invalid username/password as informational log
Add solution to react on changing "job" field and to apply defaults in "reservation" tab in same way as we do when "reservation mode" has been changed.
Reduce the risk for database deadlocks during unit tests.
Technical Changes. No change in functionality.
The mechanism of loading data into the "Find CTM Reference" form for the selected records of the "Central Trade Manager" form was added.
Enhance LFT of Unsettled Loan Facility Trades to check Commitment Amt. in Single Screen
DWH: Fixed ObjectDisposedException when executing the schema creation script
Added logging information to provide more information when crash happens
Add performance improvement for Modified Parametric VaR calculation and logs.
Destination custody field is closed for high status orders
Correct accrued interest amount rounding in Order manager allocation processing
N/A. Fix of flaky test. Added a proper way on disposing factory.
DWH: Replace ApplicationException with DataWarehouseException
Fixing binding issue
Calculate best fit column width for column by clicking on resizing edge
Flaky test ignored
CustomerApplyNote: The tests were refactored and the error messages were enhanced

Remove unit test formulas from the client's installation.
Improved Data Import Simulations SpecFlow tests
Fix an issue of Transaction Status command "Period Closure Privileges (Inactive)" when executed with "Stop final booking" on
Some warning messages got lost due to a recent necessary code change. Now, the behavior for multiple CA events per days should be restored by using different approach.
Fix hanging loading in treelist
Identity Provider configuration validation added
Updated the portal layout
It was not possible to stream to New UI in German installations.
Updated CTM command caption for search improvement
Extend Service Framework facade classes to support gRPC hosting, introduce new gRPC related attributes,  GrpcServiceHost and GrpcServiceHostFactory
Fix missing Audit history on assignment sub-list after transfer configuration
Fix flaky unit tests
Doesn't relevant for release
Corrections to the C# NetCore Services build
In certain specific cases, the user role password could unintentionally be part of a memory dump. This has now been corrected.
Add summary dependency fields to the cache job
add tests for uncovered scenarios
Fix  crash for OneLib convertible bonds in Risk
Change so RefreshPortfolioWeights and OrderFillEventThrottleThreshold to be updated properly
Replace xSwAxis with the safer function xZip
Obsolete Test helper class has been removed from the code
Implemented fix for failing auto test
DWH: Fixed "Exception of type ApplicationException was thrown"
It was added warning massages on the Save action If you have some duplication Aux. message external ID
We can now use additional directories (defined in System Environment Configuration/Directories) in Interface Options/External Forecasts for Input/Processed/Error  directory
Internal codebase refactoring. Fixed the code to improve stability. Changes made to the code do not affect system behaviour.
Some additional tests have been activated in the alternative investments area
Technical 3T
The interpolation checkbox was open for input in situations where it was not shown in the UI. This was fixed in the Trade Manager.
Improve type safety related to collateral curves
When closing a TRS holdings in some special cases the 'Accrued interest QC/PC was not 0. This has been fixed.
The "Price compensation" fund event did not work, when a multi-class fund invested in a pool fund. The error has been corrected.
Flaky test ignored

A system performance have been made for booking many equities trades on the same date for the same position. This typically happen for TRADING portfolio on internal trades where the P/L method is No P/L.
N/A: Disabling Internal integration tests
Service platform supports SinglePerAgent service instance restriction
Applying a missing filter when creating new Service type configurations. This will remove all system service types
Upgrade DevExtremeto the next version
Fix issue with grid editor closure
correction
Making market data validation set up consistent with schedule.
Improve logging for this kind of an error.

The cash effect from the commodity leg of the futures’ maturity transaction must be accounted for in the forecast cash flow service. The administrative transactions for particular holdings, which are already registered in the system should be saved into the 'Forecast Cash Flow - Payments' table. The instrument type for the commodity is added to the list where CP and CD already are present.
Fix the issue with adding top-level categories to favorites.

In case the 'Reconciliation Manager' received a time out in case multiple users tried to 'Match' or change several records at the same time and the session/user that  finally crashed needed to wait for the other process for more than 120 seconds, the 'Reconciliation Manager'  crashed completely. This has been changed such that in this case now an error message is shown asking the user to refresh the data.
Change tiles page size depending on screen size
Improvements are made to an internal integration test that is testing the functionality of the Benchmark Calculation Upload batch job.
Extend pMSCIHOLIK and related pointers to BigInt.
internal test changes
Fixed the FormContext for the Features form
Fixed a crash in the explain price search functionality of the Portfolio Calculation's List Calculation subscreen.
Enabler: with this story it should be possible to run reinvestment service on localhost and execute all calls to reinvestment from C#.
Fixed the re-initialization of auxillary jobs when deleting reporting pool records
Handling cases where election data for the same CA notification is updated and calculated simultaneously by several users/processes.
In Period Closure Privileges Bulk functionality, in Transaction Status, some user interactions for inactive transactions have been updated and limited
Add the string "scapdump" to Calculation trace window
Made amount-based the default for automatically created Alternatives securities
Fix ORA crash in compliance cleanup when there is so much data to be deleted that it is split in chunks
Refactor SimCorp.IMS.Trading.OTC.DataImport.InstrumentTest.Swaps.Test. Create separate projects for CCS, CDS, NDS and Asse Swaps to reduce execution time in Merge Gate
Add .mailmap file
Remove some redundant enclose of simple scalars
Improve type safety in fxRate* functions
Miscellaneous optimizations that will reduce the amount of memory allocations done in the Asset Manager making it slightly faster
This introduce the new file format for the bm batch job, This is hidden behind a feature flag for the time being.
Fix batching for parallel configuration import
scd.exe -batch=<batch job name> -ba_queue=<batch queue name> -wait is now responding back when the job actual has finished  for long running batch job.

When backdated changes are made to a pool factor on an ABS or US Pool which are earlier than the latest term date then two redemptions show be updated per position. Before only the first would corrected but now both are corrected.
A client specific change for loading of transactions in the portfolio calculation running on a period closure framework.
Fix  error during import DWH Model containing Web API templates (JSON file format).
A program error occurred when executing the "Update group currency values" event for the "Update Group Currency Values" window. The error has been corrected.
It wasn't possible to rename/delete entities of type FINACCOUNTS. This has been corrected.
A database error occurred when getting dependencies for a segment using the NAIC field. This has been corrected.
Improved OutOfMemoryException handling to reduce the risk of hanging process.

For 'Open ended'  'Securities Lending' positions with 'Fee paid' set to 'Last in month'  and 'Underlying' 'Bonds' was not possible anymore to create the final  'Premium' transactions after the position was closed on its 'Maturity date'. This has been fixed.
Fixed issue with slow performing query that read ratings data.  This could lead to a slow startup of the Asset Manager
Do not allow disposed Connection to  be assigned to another request

It is not allowed to do back dated deletions in Private Debt context. However the system should not crash, which is fixed now for reported scenario, which needs to include a Backdate Reprice Pay Out Unsettled transaction.  The added internal test could reproduce the reported error without including the paydowns in the deletion.
This is an internal change. This will not affect client functionality.
This is an internal change. This will not affect client functionality.
Refactoring of Look-through code
Fixed issue with deleting/modifying private debt transaction with payments
All fields that are not present in message will be treated as empty data.
This defect is about deleting a orphaned test class file
Internal test for E-37793 "GICS classification with time series in PFC" will now contain scenario for including business classification from portfolios
If a TRS contract has non-empty Valuation Fixings grid, the First Valuation Date would not update if Trade date was changed. Fix that such that Trade date always impacts First Valuation Date.

When a capital reduction transaction was booked for a position with tax-lot based P/L method then market adjustment balances were not dissolved correctly. This could lead to problems with golden equation. This has now been fixed.
Improve memory use for inflation curves - and other non-zero coupon curves
It is now possible to execute scdBatchQueue.exe in a simple deployment installation by using scLaunch.
A  new System runtime measurement has been introduced SimCorp Dimension login\Total log time that contains how long time it takes to log into SCD.
Possibility to get serviceConfigruation by id or by name is added to lightweight wcf endpoint.  Also usage in sample net service is done.
Dependencies for entries of type MOCALCMAN_OPTIOINS was missing. This has been corrected.
Redemption transactions is not visible in the Cash Viewer applet when the Expected Payment Date is shifted on today and historical mode is turned off. This has now been corrected.

The data cleanup service only deleted performance counter data once a month, even if the performance counter table wasn’t partitioned. This has been corrected.

If the table is partitioned data will be deleted once a month (drop partition).
If the table is not partitioned data will be deleted daily.
Changing number of chart series for a 3D chart caused a crash.

Now the ValueSet parser compares both with or without case sensitivity
A case sensitive compare has precedence over the compare where casing is ignored
Not relevant for release
Doesn't relevant for release
Internal change, no changes to customer functionality. Refactored checking whether it is allowed to generate corporate actions on lending underlying.
Fix for length error. Business to confirm.
Fix a crash in OOB when changing layout
Fix a crash in Asset manager portfolio sheet
We added formulas for compounded, simple, and continuous yield-to-discount factor calculations and Japanese yield and corrected minor errors in the Explain calculations.
Split was done onto BondSwap, EquitySwap and IndexSwap projects
Pressing a button on a tab-page did not always work, if the main form has visible fields, i.e. the both main form and tab page form(s) were visible at the same time.
This is an internal change. The change has no customer impact.
This is internal test  and no functionality change.

Correct internal generation of redemption term dates for bonds having Structure Bullet, not having Holiday adjust coupons ticked and having a Maturity date that isn't equal to the last coupon term date.

One new logical form test.

FxRateBindingInfo has been forced being as an array type
Webrequestcustom throws an exception when the exception message is empty, even though the getErrorResponse attribute is set to true.
